itemDescription: Muslim League leader from Sindh province, British India (1872-1942)

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Abdullah Haroon (1872–1942) (Urdu: عبداللہ ہارون‎) (also spelled Seth Haji Sir Abdoola Haroon) was a British Indian politician who made major contributions towards developing and defining the role of Muslims in economic, educational, social and political fields in the Indian subcontinent.
